description: Norelco's AccuVac Beard and Moustache Trimmer offers the best of both worlds; precise even trimming with no mess. The Accu Control System is a Norelco patented flexing guide comb which adjusts to facial contours for precise, even trimming every time. Along with this goof proof feature, the AccuVac System has superior vacuum suction that captures cut hairs so there is no mess to clean.

Step up to a new level of precision and comfort with the Norelco T970 AccuVac Vacuum Trimmer. The unique design incorporates vacuum suction to capture and direct cut hairs into the integrated hair chamber so there is no mess to clean up -- no matter what angle you're trimming.

The advanced technology of the AccuVac System, the most effective integrated vacuum available in a trimmer, effortlessly captures and directs cut hairs into the Hair Chamber so there is no mess to clean up.
The precision zoom lock locks into one of nine different settings to easily achieve a precise, even trim.
The unique AccuControl trimming system adjusts to all facial contours.

Meanwhile, the T970's "AccuControl" trimming system features a flexing guide comb that adjusts to facial contours for precise, even trimming every time. Simple to Maneuver, the AccuControl system easily trims difficult to reach areas such as the neck and chin. The trimming unit also locks into one of nine different settings for your desired beard length. The trimmer cuts precisely and evenly no matter what look you're after: stubble, goatee, or a medium to full beard.

Norelco's revolutionary "SteelWave" technology adds another dimension of precision with wave-shaped, self-sharpening blades that channel and cut hair. There's even a specialty mini-trimmer attachment that clips on for precise trimming of your mustache, sideburns, or beard line.

In addition to great trimming performance, the T970 is designed for longevity and comfort. The stainless steel self-sharpening blades offer a lifetime of precision cutting and no lubrication is ever needed. The ergonomic design provides total control over the trimming process, while making the trimmer easy to use, comfortable to hold, and simple to maneuver. The transparent hair chamber makes it easy to see when the chamber needs to be emptied to maintain optimum performance. And a five-LED battery charging level meter provides you with accurate battery power status. In addition to a full two-year warranty, the T970 comes with a 60-day money-back guarantee.
